channel.title: Unable to spawn
channel.description: How do i make some items unable to do ::pickup?

item.title: Unable to spawn
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

replace your pickup command with:

                if(command.startsWith("pickup")) {
                        int token[] = command.split(" ");
                try{
                        int newItemID = token[1];
                        int newItemAmount = token[2];
                        if(newItemID != ItemIdYouWant || newItemID != AnotherItemID || newItemID != etc) {
                                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                        } else {
                                sM("you can't spawn that item!")
                        }
                        } catch exception e {
                                sM("Syntax error! Use as ::pickup 995 200");
                        }
                }

or something like that. if it doesn’t work then post your pickup command and i’ll try helping you from there.

Read full topic
